trans-unit.source: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in the Store that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in the Store that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Notifications Visualizer
trans-unit.target: Notifications Visualizer

trans-unit.source: Notifications Visualizer
trans-unit.target: Notifications Visualizer

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in [the Store](https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/notifications-visualizer/9nblggh5xsl1) that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in [the Store](https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/notifications-visualizer/9nblggh5xsl1) that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: The Notifications Visualizer app provides instant visual previews of your tile as you edit, similar to Visual Studio's XAML editor/design view.
trans-unit.target: The Notifications Visualizer app provides instant visual previews of your tile as you edit, similar to Visual Studio's XAML editor/design view.

trans-unit.source: The app also checks for errors, which ensures that you create a valid tile payload.
trans-unit.target: The app also checks for errors, which ensures that you create a valid tile payload.

trans-unit.source: This screenshot from the app shows the XML payload and how tile sizes appear on a selected device:
trans-unit.target: This screenshot from the app shows the XML payload and how tile sizes appear on a selected device:

trans-unit.source: screenshot of notifications visualizer app editor with code and tiles
trans-unit.target: screenshot of notifications visualizer app editor with code and tiles

trans-unit.source: With Notifications Visualizer, you can create and test adaptive tile payloads without having to edit and deploy the app itself.
trans-unit.target: With Notifications Visualizer, you can create and test adaptive tile payloads without having to edit and deploy the app itself.

trans-unit.source: Once you've created a payload with ideal visual results you can integrate that into your app.
trans-unit.target: Once you've created a payload with ideal visual results you can integrate that into your app.

trans-unit.source: See [Send a local tile notification](tiles-and-notifications-sending-a-local-tile-notification.md) to learn more.
trans-unit.target: See [Send a local tile notification](tiles-and-notifications-sending-a-local-tile-notification.md) to learn more.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Notifications Visualizer's simulation of the Windows Start menu isn't always completely accurate, and it doesn't support some payload properties like [baseUri](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208712).
trans-unit.target: **Note** Notifications Visualizer's simulation of the Windows Start menu isn't always completely accurate, and it doesn't support some payload properties like [baseUri](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208712).

trans-unit.source: When you have the tile design you want, test it by pinning the tile to the actual Start menu to verify that it appears as you intend.
trans-unit.target: When you have the tile design you want, test it by pinning the tile to the actual Start menu to verify that it appears as you intend.

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: Features

trans-unit.source: Notifications Visualizer comes with a number of sample payloads to showcase what's possible with adaptive live tiles and to help you get started.
trans-unit.target: Notifications Visualizer comes with a number of sample payloads to showcase what's possible with adaptive live tiles and to help you get started.

trans-unit.source: You can experiment with all the different text options, groups/subgroups, background images, and you can see how the tile adapts to different devices and screens.
trans-unit.target: You can experiment with all the different text options, groups/subgroups, background images, and you can see how the tile adapts to different devices and screens.

trans-unit.source: Once you've made changes, you can save your updated payload to a file for future use.
trans-unit.target: Once you've made changes, you can save your updated payload to a file for future use.

trans-unit.source: The editor provides real-time errors and warnings.
trans-unit.target: The editor provides real-time errors and warnings.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your app payload is limited to less than 5 KB (a platform limitation), Notifications Visualizer warns you if your payload exceeds that limit.
trans-unit.target: For example, if your app payload is limited to less than 5 KB (a platform limitation), Notifications Visualizer warns you if your payload exceeds that limit.

trans-unit.source: It gives you warnings for incorrect attribute names or values, which helps you debug visual issues.
trans-unit.target: It gives you warnings for incorrect attribute names or values, which helps you debug visual issues.

trans-unit.source: You can control tile properties like display name, color, logos, ShowName, badge value.
trans-unit.target: You can control tile properties like display name, color, logos, ShowName, badge value.

trans-unit.source: These options help you instantly understand how your tile properties and tile notification payloads interact, and the results they produce.
trans-unit.target: These options help you instantly understand how your tile properties and tile notification payloads interact, and the results they produce.
